description: Enterprise techniques used by WIRTE, ATT&CK group G0090 v1.0
name: WIRTE (G0090)

techniques.comment: WIRTE has decoded a base64 encoded document which was embedded in a VBS script.
WIRTE has used PowerShell for script execution.
WIRTE has used Regsvr32.exe to trigger the execution of a malicious script.
WIRTE has downloaded PowerShell code from the C2 server to be executed.
WIRTE has used VBS and PowerShell scripts throughout its operation.
WIRTE has used HTTP for network communication.
